New Records: The Phillies pitching staff had a team ERA of 2.20, the best among the final four teams in the playoffs.
Key Match Events: The Diamondbacks defeated the Phillies in the NLCS, ending their season.
Taijuan Walker expressed dissatisfaction with not being used in the postseason by liking tweets critical of the Phillies' manager.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Diamondbacks' victory marked their first World Series win in 11 years.
Walker's tweets criticized the Phillies' playoff decisions and management.
